description: This file defines a class AppTheme that provides a static method to generate a custom ThemeData object for Flutter UI, specifically implementing the Ocean Professional theme with specific color schemes and widget styles.

classes.name: AppTheme
classes.description: A utility class providing a custom theme for Flutter applications.

methods.name: oceanProfessional
methods.description: Returns a ThemeData object configured with the Ocean Professional color scheme and styling for various Flutter widgets.
